## Solutions

:::{.callout-tip}
Hover over the code and copy the content by clicking on the clipboard icon on the top right. You can now paste this into an R-Script.
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

source("01_R_Files/helperfunctions.R")

```
